dc_title_s: Map #1, enlarged from the map of the division of real estate of Peter Burdett, dec'd, filed in the surrogate's office, Bergen County
dc_description_s: Map showing property division of Peter Burdett, dec'd, filed from the surrogate's office, Bergen County|Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection|Note on filed map: Protacted by a scale of five chains to an inch on the 23rd day of February 1830, John D. Haring, Surveyor|Scale noted as 100 feet to 1 inch, or 1:1200, but note from filed map states 5 chains to one inch, which would be 1:3960. Using 1:1200 as note states this is an enlargement.|Note states filed map from 1830, but this map is a copy/enlargement of that one appears to be much more recent than that. No other date given.
